data.tariff_type: Type of tariff for this meter (if any)
data.tariff_sensor: Sensor that shows current tariff (if applcable)

error.no_fixed: Fixed tariff selected, but no number found.
error.no_tariff_sensor: Tariff type sensor selected, but no sensor provided.
error.no_import_or_export: At least one import and one export meter are needed for the battery to work.

addmeter.description: Add each meter that monitors electricity coming into and going out of your house. Import meters measure energy coming into your home from the grid and will be used to discharge the battery. Export meters measure energy leaving your house to the grid and will be used to charge the battery. The battery shouldn't monitor solar generation directly, only import and export.
